original_text: Omri did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, and did more evil than all who were before him.
korean_text: 오므리가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그 전의 모든 사람보다 더욱 악하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: Omri did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
and did more evil than all who were before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자기 이전의 모든 사람보다 더 악을 행했습니다.
